statements: SELECT * FROM email_segments;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM email_segments ORDER BY segment_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT segment_id, engagement_metrics->>'open_rate' as open_rate FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, engagement_metrics FROM email_segments WHERE segment_id > 1 ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT segment_id, segment_name FROM email_segments WHERE engagement_metrics ->> 'click_rate' > '0.1' AND demographic_criteria ->> 'age_group' = '18-25';
SELECT * FROM email_segments WHERE segment_name LIKE '%new%' OR segment_name LIKE '%promo%';
SELECT segment_id, COUNT(segment_name) AS total_segments FROM email_segments GROUP BY segment_id HAVING COUNT(segment_name) > 1 ORDER BY total_segments DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT email FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND age < 50;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, registration_date FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY registration_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, newsletter_subscription FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name, age, registration_date FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_engagement ON users.user_id = user_engagement.user_id WHERE age > 30 AND engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, last_login ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name, registration_date FROM users WHERE age < 18 OR age > 65 ORDER BY registration_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name, registration_date, engagement_score, newsletter_subscription FROM users LEFT JOIN user_engagement ON users.user_id = user_engagement.user_id WHERE engagement_score IS NULL OR newsletter_subscription = TRUE ORDER BY registration_date DESC, engagement_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT email, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, location, engagement_score FROM users WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT user_id, income, education, job_title FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT promo_id, promo_type, redeemed FROM promotions WHERE promo_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, age, gender, location FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT email, age, location FROM users JOIN demographics ON users.user_id = demographics.user_id WHERE demographics.income > 50000;
SELECT user_id, email, job_title, marital_status, income FROM users JOIN demographics ON users.user_id = demographics.user_id WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT user_id, promo_type, promo_date, redeemed FROM promotions WHERE redeemed = TRUE ORDER BY promo_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, engagement_score FROM users WHERE engagement_score > 80 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT email, location FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM user_engagement ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_segment = 'Summer';
SELECT user_id, email, location FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM users WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_engagement WHERE interaction_duration > 10 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, age_group FROM demographics WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE promotion_segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM user_demographics;
SELECT email, age, gender FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, first_name, email FROM user_demographics ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.first_name, e.click_count FROM user_demographics u JOIN email_engagement e ON u.user_id = e.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'F'
SELECT ud.first_name, ud.last_name, ee.open_count, ee.click_count FROM user_demographics ud JOIN email_engagement ee ON ud.user_id = ee.user_id
SELECT promo_name, start_date, end_date, s.segment_name FROM promotion JOIN segment s ON promotion.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'

SELECT ud.first_name, ud.last_name, e.click_count, p.promo_name FROM user_demographics ud JOIN email_engagement e ON ud.user_id = e.user_id JOIN promotion p ON p.segment_id = e.user_id GROUP BY ud.user_id
